message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $60.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $120 represents my initial asking price, I'm willing to come down to $100. I'm confident you'll find this to be a fair offer.
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about $80?
